data.title: Leer to Peek Front B Site from Back B Site
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer that you can use to hold B Site.

data.title: A Lamps Retake Leer
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer that you can use to retake A Lamps.

data.title: Leer from Hookah to Peek into B Short
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer from inside of Hookah, that you can use to peek into B Short.

data.title: Site Hold / Retake Leer from Behind Truck on A Site
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer from behind Truck on A Site that is useful to either hold, or retake A Site.
